attributes.additional_details: Because it will be better for us kids and teens as we won’t be as tired on a Monday morning
attributes.background: I want you to give us less school days so we can get more rest to charge up our bodies for the days we do go to school and learn.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Change the school week to a four day week:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643506
